monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: When an allied monster applies a Debuff, it has a 60% chance to gain a random Buff.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Acid Tempest
skills.description: 1 x 155% magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Acid Tempest Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 125% (250%) magical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Attack Mastery
skills.description: Every physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Attack value.

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Blood Drive
skills.description: Unique Aura: Whenever an enemy takes Poison, Burn or Congeal damage, there is a 75% chance to apply a Bleed stack equal to that damage.

skills.name: Broken Immunity
skills.description: Unique Aura: Armor Break on enemies also increases chances to apply Debuffs on them by 20%.

skills.name: Cataclysm
skills.description: 4 x 75% (300%) magical damage (fire/water/wind/earth) Hits all enemies Applies Burn, Chill, Shock or Poison

skills.name: Cleanse
skills.description: Every hit has a 25% chance to remove a Buff from the target.

skills.name: Corrosive Assault
skills.description: 2 x 150% (300%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, 40% chance to apply Armor Break (Debuff) - 40% chance to apply Poison (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs
skills.description: 3 x 60% (180%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs Lvl 2
skills.description: 3 x 80% (240%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs Lvl 3
skills.description: 4 x 70% (280%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs Lvl 4
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Corrosive Jabs Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 115% (460%) physical damage (water) Applies Armor Break (Debuff)

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Consistency
skills.description: +10% Critical Damage. Critical Damage also increases non-Critical hits by 10% of the amount.

skills.name: Critical Poison
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Poison (Debuff).

skills.name: Death Blow
skills.description: Deals 5% increased damage for each Debuff on the target.

skills.name: Debuff Mastery
skills.description: This Monster may apply an additional stack of any Debuff. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Debuff Resistance
skills.description: Debuff effects reduced by 50%

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Double Impact
skills.description: When exploiting an enemy's weakness with an attack, trigger an additional 50% damage hit.

skills.name: Earth Affinity
skills.description: Earth attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Fire Affinity
skills.description: Fire attacks deal 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Firestorm
skills.description: 1 x 160% magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Firestorm Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) magical damage (fire) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Godly Strikes
skills.description: 4 x 140% (560%) physical damage (neutral) - Damage is increased by 3% for every Buff on this Monster

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Hexed Touch
skills.description: When this Monster gets attacked, 50% chance to apply a random Debuff on the attacker.

skills.name: Hybrid Mastery
skills.description: Increases Attack by 10% of this Monster's Magic and increases Magic by 10% of this Monster's Attack.

skills.name: Igniting Gas
skills.description: Unique Aura: When an enemy takes Poison (Debuff) damage, 40% chance to apply Burn.

skills.name: Igniting Stings
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 60% (360%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Igniting Stings Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) physical damage (fire) Applies Burn (Debuff)

skills.name: Impactful Shock
skills.description: Unique Aura: Shock hits have a 40% increased Critical Chance and do 10% increased base damage.

skills.name: Lifesteal
skills.description: Heal by 15% of the damage dealt to enemies.

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Magical Weakness
skills.description: Magical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Mana Burn
skills.description: Whenever an enemy takes Burn (Debuff) damage, regenerate 10 Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 20. Increases Mana Regeneration by 11)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mass Mystify
skills.description: Aura: When an allied monster applies a Debuff, it has a 60% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Mystify
skills.description: When applying a Debuff, 50% chance to gain a random Buff.

skills.name: Occult Control
skills.description: Aura: Occult Monsters in the party receive 3% reduced damage from a debuffed enemy for each Debuff on them.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Shocking Slash Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies, 50% chance to apply Shock (Debuff)

skills.description: Water attacks deal 10% increased damage.

drops.name: Abyssal Sword
drops.description: When attacking or getting attacked, 50% chance to gain a random Buff or apply a random Debuff

drops.name: Shift Stone
drops.description: Changes a Monster to dark-shifted or light-shifted variation

drops.name: Skill Potion
drops.description: Grants a skill point. Can only be consumed once per Monster
